message.content:
Attraction basically refers to the desire or appeal that someone has towards another person, place, object, or concept. There are various factors at play when it comes to attraction. Some well-known forms of attraction include physical and emotional attractions.

Physical attraction is often based on certain characteristics such as appearance, symmetry, body proportions or scent â€“ attributes deemed attractive by cultural norms and personal preferences. This can cause an individual's interest in another human as a mate or partner.

Emotional attraction pertains to a deeper connection with an individual based on their personality, values, sense of humor and other character traits. It arises from getting to know someone better through communication and bonding over shared experiences.

Apart from these two primary types of attractions; romantic love comprises both physical attractiveness (sexual desire) and emotional ATTRACTIVENESS (deep connections).
